original: grags pas grub par khas len na ni ri bong can la yang mi bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grags pas grub par khas len na ni ri bong can la yang mi bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If one accepts that it is established by common usage, then it cannot be refuted even in the case of ‚Äúrabbit horns.‚Äù

original: dngos po la de grub na ri bong can la yang bzlog tu med pa yin la /
analyzed: dngos po la de grub na ri bong can la yang bzlog tu med pa yin la /
translated: If it were established in the case of things, then it could not be refuted even in the case of ‚Äúrabbit horns.‚Äù

original: dngos po la de med na ri bong can la bzlog kyang skyon 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: dngos po la de med na ri bong can la bzlog kyang skyon 'ga' yang med do //
translated: If it is not established in the case of things, then even if it is refuted in the case of ‚Äúrabbit horns,‚Äù there is no fault.

original: de'i phyir dngos po la nges pa ma yin pa'i brda dang ldan pa'i sgra las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi rung ba ni don thams cad yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po la nges pa ma yin pa'i brda dang ldan pa'i sgra las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi rung ba ni don thams cad yin te /
translated: Therefore, in the case of words that have conventional expressions that are not established in things, all things are possible,

original: 'dod pa la gegs byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa la gegs byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no obstruction to desire.

original: 'dis ni sgra rnams ni brda'i rjes su byed pas don la nges pa 'ga' yang med la /
analyzed: 'dis ni sgra rnams ni brda'i rjes su byed pas don la nges pa 'ga' yang med la /
translated: This shows that words, following conventional expressions, do not ascertain any meaning at all.

original: 'di dag de la 'gog na yang 'gal ba yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag de la 'gog na yang 'gal ba yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: And if one refutes them in that regard, there is no contradiction.

original: des ni rgyu mtshan can sgra yi //
analyzed: des ni rgyu mtshan can sgra yi //
translated: This is the reason why the meaning of the word,

original: don nam sgra rnams kyi ni don //
analyzed: don nam sgra rnams kyi ni don //
translated: or the meaning of the words,

original: don dam pa nyid 'gog pa la //
analyzed: don dam pa nyid 'gog pa la //
translated: is not refuted in the refutation of the ultimate itself.

original: gnod pa med par rjod pa yin //
analyzed: gnod pa med par rjod pa yin //
translated: This is the statement that is not faulty.

original: des na yul gyi khyad par ni //
analyzed: des na yul gyi khyad par ni //
translated: Therefore, in order to show the difference of the object,

original: bstan phyir grags pa rjes dpag las //
analyzed: bstan phyir grags pa rjes dpag las //
translated: the inference based on what is commonly recognized,

original: phyi rol gyur pa ma yin yang //
analyzed: phyi rol gyur pa ma yin yang //
translated: is not external,

original: tha dad byas yin snga ma yin //
analyzed: tha dad byas yin snga ma yin //
translated: but is made different by the former.

original: zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
translated: This is the verse in the middle.

original: mngon sum dang 'gal ba yang rang bzhin sna tshogs can gyis rang bzhin gang zhig 'dres par snang ba'i blo mthong ba med pa'i phyir 'brel pa can gzhan med pas nyan pa la gnyis med par snang ba de nyid spong na 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum dang 'gal ba yang rang bzhin sna tshogs can gyis rang bzhin gang zhig 'dres par snang ba'i blo mthong ba med pa'i phyir 'brel pa can gzhan med pas nyan pa la gnyis med par snang ba de nyid spong na 'gal ba yin te /
translated: It is contradictory because the direct perception of the mixed appearance of a nature with various natures is not seen by the mind, and there is no other related object. When that very appearance without duality is refuted for the listener, it is contradictory.

original: dper na sgra ni mnyan par mi bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na sgra ni mnyan par mi bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like saying Sound is not to be listened to.

original: de'i phyir yang don zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir yang don zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is also explained as the meaning.

original: rang bzhin de nyid de la don //
analyzed: rang bzhin de nyid de la don //
translated: That very nature is the meaning for that.

original: lhag ma ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can //
analyzed: lhag ma ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can //
translated: The rest have the characteristic of the reverse.

original: spyi ni dngos med @200b ngo bo yin //
analyzed: spyi ni dngos med @200b ngo bo yin //
translated: The universal is the nature of non-entity.

original: de'i phyir de dbang spyod yul min //
analyzed: de'i phyir de dbang spyod yul min //
translated: Therefore, it is not the object of the senses.

original: des na spyi yi chos rnams ni //
analyzed: des na spyi yi chos rnams ni //
translated: Thus, since the properties of the universal

original: mngon sum min par grub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: mngon sum min par grub pa'i phyir //
translated: are not established by direct perception,

original: spong yang gnod pa med do zhes //
analyzed: spong yang gnod pa med do zhes //
translated: there is no harm in rejecting it.

original: mnyan bya smos pas bstan pa yin //
analyzed: mnyan bya smos pas bstan pa yin //
translated: This is taught by the word ‚Äúhearable.‚Äù

original: rnam kun brjod bya'i dngos min phyir //
analyzed: rnam kun brjod bya'i dngos min phyir //
translated: Because it is not the entity that is to be expressed in every way,

original: de la brten nas grub pas na //
analyzed: de la brten nas grub pas na //
translated: it is established in dependence on that.

original: de yi stobs kyis gnod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de yi stobs kyis gnod pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is harmed by the power of that,

original: mnyan byas dbang po'i yul du bshad //
analyzed: mnyan byas dbang po'i yul du bshad //
translated: the hearable is explained as the object of the senses.

original: ces bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
translated: These are the verses in the middle.

original: rjes su dpag pa dang 'gal ba yang dper na bum pa rtag go zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa dang 'gal ba yang dper na bum pa rtag go zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: There is also contradiction with inference, as in the case of the statement, ‚ÄúThe pot is permanent.‚Äù

original: brdegs pa bzod par mthong ba dag las 'khrul pas de ltar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brdegs pa bzod par mthong ba dag las 'khrul pas de ltar 'gyur ro //
translated: It is seen that some people endure being beaten, and so there is error.

original: de yang mthong bas 'gags pa'i bum pa bzhin du skye ba dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i phyir mi srid do //
analyzed: de yang mthong bas 'gags pa'i bum pa bzhin du skye ba dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i phyir mi srid do //
translated: But that is impossible, because it possesses arising, etc., like a pot that is stopped by being seen.

original: gal te mi rtag pa'i bum pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa'i bum pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: If you say that no impermanent pot exists,

original: der yang gsal ba bskal pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: der yang gsal ba bskal pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it is destroyed in the next moment,

original: de'i gnas skabs ma yin pa ni mi rtag pa yin par smra la /
analyzed: de'i gnas skabs ma yin pa ni mi rtag pa yin par smra la /
translated: we reply that we call that which is not in that condition ‚Äúimpermanent.‚Äù

original: de'i gnas skabs ni de nyid yin no //üîΩde ni 'gags pa la yod pa ma yin pas zhig pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: de'i gnas skabs ni de nyid yin no // de ni 'gags pa la yod pa ma yin pas zhig pa'i phyir ram /
translated: That condition is just that.

original: bskal pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la ni mngon par zhen pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bskal pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la ni mngon par zhen pa ma yin no //
translated: Since it does not exist when it has ceased, we do not cling to the idea that it is destroyed or that it is destroyed because it is different.

original: 'di'i dmigs par bya ba dbus kyi rang bzhin de yang sngon dang phyi ma'i mthar yang yod do zhes bya bas ni tshig gi don rnam par bzhag pa la gnod do //
analyzed: 'di'i dmigs par bya ba dbus kyi rang bzhin de yang sngon dang phyi ma'i mthar yang yod do zhes bya bas ni tshig gi don rnam par bzhag pa la gnod do //
translated: The statement ‚ÄúThat which is to be perceived as the middle also exists at the end‚Äù contradicts the established meaning of the words.

original: de lta na ni snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa dang sems pa yod pa dag phan tshun rang bzhin tha dad pa rnam par gzhag pa mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa dang sems pa yod pa dag phan tshun rang bzhin tha dad pa rnam par gzhag pa mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If that were so, it would be impossible to establish that sattva, rajas, and tamas and the conscious entity are different in nature.

original: de la yang mi dmigs pa las ma gtogs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i rten gzhan ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: de la yang mi dmigs pa las ma gtogs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i rten gzhan ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: And there is no other basis for the establishment of non-apprehension except non-apprehension.

original: de'i phyir don ltar dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i zho la sogs pa 'o ma la sogs pa dag la ma dmigs pa ni med la /
analyzed: de'i phyir don ltar dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i zho la sogs pa 'o ma la sogs pa dag la ma dmigs pa ni med la /
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to say that the non-apprehension of curd, etc. in milk, etc., which are characterized by the apprehension of an object, does not exist,

original: 'o ma yang de la med do zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs @201a * //üîΩpa yin no //
analyzed: 'o ma yang de la med do zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs @201a * // pa yin no //
translated: and that milk does not exist in curd.

original: zho la sogs pa 'o ma la sogs pa dag la dmigs pa'i rjes su dpag pa yod pa nyid de /
analyzed: zho la sogs pa 'o ma la sogs pa dag la dmigs pa'i rjes su dpag pa yod pa nyid de /
translated: The existence of inference of curd, etc. in milk, etc. is not tenable,

original: mi nus pa las mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: mi nus pa las mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it does not arise from what is incapable of producing it.

original: de 'dra ba'i dngos po ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul ma yin no //
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i dngos po ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul ma yin no //
translated: Such a thing is not the object of inference.

original: de ni yod na bltar rung ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: de ni yod na bltar rung ba nyid yin te /
translated: If it exists, it is suitable to be seen,

original: gal te yod na dbus kyi gnas skabs bzhin du dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te yod na dbus kyi gnas skabs bzhin du dmigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: because if it exists, it would be apprehended like the middle part.

original: de'i mtshan nyid btang ba nyid de'i 'jig pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid btang ba nyid de'i 'jig pa yin la /
translated: The abandonment of its characteristic is its destruction.

original: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa yang gzhan yin te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa yang gzhan yin te /
translated: And it is different if it has a different characteristic.

original: tha dad pa ni 'gal ba'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes mang du bshad zin to //
analyzed: tha dad pa ni 'gal ba'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes mang du bshad zin to //
translated: We have already explained at length that difference has the characteristic of being a contradictory nature.

original: de las skyes pas ni rgyu de de skyed pa'i rang bzhin yin par 'grub kyi /
analyzed: de las skyes pas ni rgyu de de skyed pa'i rang bzhin yin par 'grub kyi /
translated: Since it is produced from that, the cause is established as having the nature of producing that.

original: de'i ngo bor ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i ngo bor ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the nature of that.

original: gal te med pa las skye na //
analyzed: gal te med pa las skye na //
translated: If it is produced from what does not exist,

original: ci'i phyir 'o ma las ri bong gi rva ma yin te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'o ma las ri bong gi rva ma yin te /
translated: why is it not produced from the horn of a rabbit?

original: med par khyad par med pa la khyad par ci zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: med par khyad par med pa la khyad par ci zhig yod ce na /
translated: If there is no difference in nonexistence, what difference is there?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: rgyu'i rang bzhin tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu'i rang bzhin tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the nature of the cause is different.

original: 'o ma de'i bdag nyid ma yin yang zho skyed par byed la ri bong gi rva skyed par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'o ma de'i bdag nyid ma yin yang zho skyed par byed la ri bong gi rva skyed par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Although milk is not the nature of curd, it produces curd but does not produce a rabbit‚Äôs horn. That is its nature.

original: de'i de gang las she na /
analyzed: de'i de gang las she na /
translated: What is that of it?

original: rang gi rgyus skyed pa yin te /
analyzed: rang gi rgyus skyed pa yin te /
translated: It is produced by its own cause.

original: de ltar rgyu'i rang bzhin thog ma med pa brgyud pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rgyu'i rang bzhin thog ma med pa brgyud pa yin no //
translated: Thus the nature of the cause is an endless series.

original: de'i phyir skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu nyid med pa'i phyir ri bong gi rva mi skye la /
analyzed: de'i phyir skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu nyid med pa'i phyir ri bong gi rva mi skye la /
translated: Therefore, since the cause that is the nature of a producer does not exist, a rabbit‚Äôs horns are not produced.

original: gzhan la ni de yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan la ni de yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But in the case of other things, that cause does exist.üîΩIf you ask, ‚ÄúWhat is this so-called potentiality?‚Äù

original: ci ste yang nus pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig / dngos po de nyid yin nam /
analyzed: ci ste yang nus pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig / dngos po de nyid yin nam /
translated: Is it the thing itself?

original: 'on te gzhan cung zad cig yin /
analyzed: 'on te gzhan cung zad cig yin /
translated: Or is it something else?

original: de nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid do zhe na /
translated: If you say it is the thing itself,

original: de kho na ltar dmigs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de kho na ltar dmigs par 'gyur te /
translated: then it would be perceived just as it is,

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no difference between them.

original: khyad par yod na yang brjod zin to //
analyzed: khyad par yod na yang brjod zin to //
translated: If there is a difference, then that has already been explained.

original: gzhan yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say it is something else,

original: ji ltar gzhan yod na de yod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan yod na de yod par 'gyur te /
translated: then how could it exist if something else exists?

original: nye bar btags @201b pa tsam du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nye bar btags @201b pa tsam du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It would not be a mere designation.

original: 'dis ni phyi ma la yod pa yang bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni phyi ma la yod pa yang bsal ba yin no //
translated: This also refutes the existence of potentiality in the future.

original: bde blag tu gzung ba'i phyogs kyi chos kyi rab tu dbye bas gtan tshigs kyi skabs kyi mdor bsdus nas brjod pa /
analyzed: bde blag tu gzung ba'i phyogs kyi chos kyi rab tu dbye bas gtan tshigs kyi skabs kyi mdor bsdus nas brjod pa /
translated: The author of the root text has stated a summary of the chapter on inference in order to easily grasp the classification of the properties of a position:

original: phyogs chos mthun phyogs yod med dang // rnam gnyis re re dag la yang //
analyzed: phyogs chos mthun phyogs yod med dang // rnam gnyis re re dag la yang //
translated: The property of the position, the presence of the similar class, the absence of the dissimilar class, and the two kinds of each of those.

original: rnam gsum mi mthun phyogs la yang //
analyzed: rnam gsum mi mthun phyogs la yang //
translated: The three are not in the discordant side,

original: yod med rnam pa gnyis phyir ro //
analyzed: yod med rnam pa gnyis phyir ro //
translated: because of the two kinds of existence and non-existence.

original: phyogs ni chos can no //
analyzed: phyogs ni chos can no //
translated: The side is the subject.

original: dgos pa med pa'i phyir nye bar gdags par mi bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: dgos pa med pa'i phyir nye bar gdags par mi bya'o zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not to be applied because it is useless,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: chos can thams cad kyi chos dgag pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: chos can thams cad kyi chos dgag pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is for the sake of refuting the properties of all subjects,

original: de'i phyogs gcig pas der gcig yin pas der nye bar gdags su rung ba'i chos can rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //üîΩde lta yin dang mig gi gzung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de'i phyogs gcig pas der gcig yin pas der nye bar gdags su rung ba'i chos can rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro // de lta yin dang mig gi gzung ba'i phyir //
translated: because it is proper to apply it to the subject that is understood as being one of its parts.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa spangs pa yin no //
translated: If that were not so, then the statement ‚Äúbecause of the apprehension of the object of the eye‚Äù would be rejected.

original: gal te chos zhes rjod pas kyang chos can yin par gzhi lta 'grub ste /
analyzed: gal te chos zhes rjod pas kyang chos can yin par gzhi lta 'grub ste /
translated: If you say that the subject is established by the expression of the property,

original: chos can zhes smos pa'i shugs kyis nye ba yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yin par 'grub po zhe na /
analyzed: chos can zhes smos pa'i shugs kyis nye ba yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yin par 'grub po zhe na /
translated: because the subject is implied by the expression of the property, and because the subject of the probandum is established,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: dpe'i chos can yang nye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe'i chos can yang nye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the example subject is also implied.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par brjod pas dpe'i chos can la yod par grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par brjod pas dpe'i chos can la yod par grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Since it is said to exist in the similar class, it is established as existing in the example subject.

original: chos can gyi chos zhes brjod pas bsgrub bya'i chos can yin par yongs su bzung ngo zhe na /
analyzed: chos can gyi chos zhes brjod pas bsgrub bya'i chos can yin par yongs su bzung ngo zhe na /
translated: Since it is said to be the attribute of the subject, it is taken to be the attribute of the thesis.

original: de ltar bshad par bya ba la 'bad pa de ni phyogs zhes brjod pas spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar bshad par bya ba la 'bad pa de ni phyogs zhes brjod pas spangs pa yin no //
translated: The effort to explain it in that way is abandoned by the term pak·π£a.

original: shugs kyis don go na rtogs par dka' ba yongs su spang ba'i yang phyir ro //
analyzed: shugs kyis don go na rtogs par dka' ba yongs su spang ba'i yang phyir ro //
translated: And because it is difficult to understand when the meaning is understood indirectly.

original: gal te phyogs kyi chos nyid yin na de'i khyad par la ltos pa gzhan la mi 'jug pa'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa nyid do zhe na yin te /üîΩdper na nag pa 'phong skyen no zhes bya ba lta bur ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pas khyad @202a * //
analyzed: gal te phyogs kyi chos nyid yin na de'i khyad par la ltos pa gzhan la mi 'jug pa'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa nyid do zhe na yin te / dper na nag pa 'phong skyen no zhes bya ba lta bur ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pas khyad @202a * //
translated: If it is the attribute of the subject, it is not shared with others because it does not rely on its distinctions.

original: par du byas pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: par du byas pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is not, because it is distinguished by the exclusion of the unrelated, as in the statement ‚ÄúNƒÅga is skilled in archery.‚Äù

original: dper na srid sgrub 'phong skyen no zhes bya ba lta bur gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas ni ma yin no zhes mang du bshad zin to //
analyzed: dper na srid sgrub 'phong skyen no zhes bya ba lta bur gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas ni ma yin no zhes mang du bshad zin to //
translated: For example, it is like the statement, ‚ÄúArjuna is skilled in archery,‚Äù which does not exclude his possession of other skills.

original: phyogs kyi chos de ni rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos de ni rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
translated: The property of the position is divided into three types:

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang / med pa dang rnam pa gnyi ga'o //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang / med pa dang rnam pa gnyi ga'o //
translated: existing in the similar class, not existing in the dissimilar class, and existing in both.

original: rnam pa gsum po de ni re re yang rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te //
analyzed: rnam pa gsum po de ni re re yang rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te //
translated: Each of these three types is threefold:

original: 'di ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa dang rnam pa gnyi ga'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa dang rnam pa gnyi ga'o //
translated: existing in the dissimilar class, not existing in the similar class, and existing in both.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyis don mthun pa'o //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyis don mthun pa'o //
translated: The similar class is that which shares the meaning of the property of the thesis.

original: de med pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs so //
analyzed: de med pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs so //
translated: The dissimilar class is that which does not have that.

original: da ni ji ltar med pa la yod do zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: da ni ji ltar med pa la yod do zhes brjod ce na /
translated: Now, how can one say that it exists in the non-existent?

original: de bkag pa tsam ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin no //
analyzed: de bkag pa tsam ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin no //
translated: The mere negation of that is not the dissimilar class.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What, then, is it?

original: bzlog pa med pa dang ma yin pa thams cad de /
analyzed: bzlog pa med pa dang ma yin pa thams cad de /
translated: It is the absence of the opposite and all that is not that.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the characteristic of the opposite of the characteristic of the discordant side.

original: de ni brjod par 'dod pa'i bzlog pa thams cad la mtshungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni brjod par 'dod pa'i bzlog pa thams cad la mtshungs pa yin te /
translated: That is the same in all cases of the opposite of what is intended to be expressed,

original: dngos sam shugs kyis ldog par rtogs pa thams cad la mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos sam shugs kyis ldog par rtogs pa thams cad la mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all cases of the understanding of the opposite, whether directly or indirectly, are the same.

original: phyogs kyi chos 'di'i de kho na nyid dang mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa ni gtan tshigs la sogs pa dag la ji ltar rigs par rang nyid rtogs par byed pa'i sgrub par byed pa ji lta ba dag gis ngesüîΩpar gzung ste /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos 'di'i de kho na nyid dang mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa ni gtan tshigs la sogs pa dag la ji ltar rigs par rang nyid rtogs par byed pa'i sgrub par byed pa ji lta ba dag gis nges par gzung ste /
translated: The existence and nonexistence of the property of the subject in the similar and discordant instances are ascertained by means of the proofs that are to be understood by themselves in the reasonings, etc., in accordance with the nature of reality.

original: the tshom dang phyin ci log gi rang bzhin 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa gsal bar byed pa dag ni rtogs pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: the tshom dang phyin ci log gi rang bzhin 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa gsal bar byed pa dag ni rtogs pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: The desire to clarify doubt and the nature of error, whether desired or not, are not proofs of understanding,

original: phyin ci log dang the tshom gyi rtogs pa can gyi sgra bzhin no //
analyzed: phyin ci log dang the tshom gyi rtogs pa can gyi sgra bzhin no //
translated: because they are like the words of one who understands through error and doubt.

original: ma nges pa ni phyogs kyi chos nyid de /
analyzed: ma nges pa ni phyogs kyi chos nyid de /
translated: The inconclusive is the property of the position.

original: ma 'brel pa las rtogs par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma 'brel pa las rtogs par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not suitable to be understood from a non-related reason.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa'am med pa nyid du nges pa la ltos pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa'am med pa nyid du nges pa la ltos pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not dependent on the ascertainment of existence or non-existence in the similar and dissimilar classes,

original: nges pa la the tshom za ba nyid kyi sgo nas skyon du 'gyur la /
analyzed: nges pa la the tshom za ba nyid kyi sgo nas skyon du 'gyur la /
translated: because the fault would arise from the very doubt about the ascertainment.

original: de ni ma nges pa la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni ma nges pa la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is the same in the case of the inconclusive.

original: rnam pa de lta bu brjod pa yang 'dir sun 'byin pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu brjod pa yang 'dir sun 'byin pa yin no //
translated: Such a form of expression is also a refutation here.

original: gzhan du ni gnyi ga'am gcig la the tshom za ba'am /üîΩgcig phyin ci log tu gyur pa ni sgrub pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: gzhan du ni gnyi ga'am gcig la the tshom za ba'am / gcig phyin ci log tu gyur pa ni sgrub pa ma yin zhing /
translated: Otherwise, both or one would be doubted,

original: sun 'byin pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: sun 'byin pa yang ma yin te /
translated: or one would be mistaken, and that is neither a proof nor a refutation.

original: sgrub pa'i yan @202b lag de lta bu ni nus pa med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i yan @202b lag de lta bu ni nus pa med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because such a part of a proof is powerless.

original: thun mong ma yin pa yang gnyi ga las phyi rol du gyur pa'i mi srid pas gnyi ga las ldog pa des mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / gnyis las gcig la yang yod par rtogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa med pa'i phyir na 'jug pa dang ldog pa dag la the tshom gyi rgyu nyid de /
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa yang gnyi ga las phyi rol du gyur pa'i mi srid pas gnyi ga las ldog pa des mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / gnyis las gcig la yang yod par rtogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa med pa'i phyir na 'jug pa dang ldog pa dag la the tshom gyi rgyu nyid de /
translated: And since it is impossible for the uncommon to be external to both, it is not tenable that it is the reversal of both. And since there is no proof that it exists in either one, it is the cause of doubt regarding engagement and reversal.

original: skyes bu rnams las gzhan las ma byung bar nges shing yon tan mtshungs ba'i skyes bu dag las srid pa'i bud med kyi mngal bzhin no //
analyzed: skyes bu rnams las gzhan las ma byung bar nges shing yon tan mtshungs ba'i skyes bu dag las srid pa'i bud med kyi mngal bzhin no //
translated: It is ascertained that it does not arise from anything other than a person, and from among persons who have similar qualities, it is like the womb of a woman of the world.

original: ji skad bsgrub par bya ba'i chos thun mong ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni khyad par ji snyed kyis thams cad bsdus pa de la the tshom za ba'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: ji skad bsgrub par bya ba'i chos thun mong ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni khyad par ji snyed kyis thams cad bsdus pa de la the tshom za ba'i rgyu yin te /
translated: The uncommon property to be proven is the cause of doubt regarding however many distinctions encompass everything.

original: de dang ldan pa des bsdus pa'i phyir dang / gcig tu nges pa ldog pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa des bsdus pa'i phyir dang / gcig tu nges pa ldog pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa lta bu'o //
translated: Because it is possessed by that, it is included by that, and because it is the reversal of the ascertainment of one, it is like the explanation.

original: de dang ldan pa des bsdus pa'i phyir zhes bya bas ni gsum pa gang la dngos po chos 'di gnas par 'gyur ba rnam pa'i khyad par las phyi rol du gyur pa med par bshad pa yin la /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa des bsdus pa'i phyir zhes bya bas ni gsum pa gang la dngos po chos 'di gnas par 'gyur ba rnam pa'i khyad par las phyi rol du gyur pa med par bshad pa yin la /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúbecause it is included in that‚Äù explains that there is no external reality apart from the particular aspect in which this entity, the object, is present.

original: gcig tu nges pa ldog pas ni gcig gi dngos por rtogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa med par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: gcig tu nges pa ldog pas ni gcig gi dngos por rtogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa med par bshad pa yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúbecause of the ascertainment of the one‚Äù explains that there is no proof for the understanding of the entity as one.

original: gtan tshigs gnyis po 'di gcig las bsdus pas ni rnam pa'i khyad par thams cad la the tshom za ba yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gnyis po 'di gcig las bsdus pas ni rnam pa'i khyad par thams cad la the tshom za ba yin no //
translated: Since these two reasons are included in the one, there is doubt about all particular aspects.

original: ldog pa nges na khyad par gcod pa'i gtan tshigs nyid yin pa gang gis bzlog ces bshad zin to //
analyzed: ldog pa nges na khyad par gcod pa'i gtan tshigs nyid yin pa gang gis bzlog ces bshad zin to //
translated: When there is ascertainment of the exclusion, it is the reason that determines the particular aspect.

original: nges pa'i gtan tshigs la yang spobs pa med pa'i phyir the tshom du 'gyur na /
analyzed: nges pa'i gtan tshigs la yang spobs pa med pa'i phyir the tshom du 'gyur na /
translated: If there is doubt because of the lack of confidence in the ascertaining reason,

original: de yang gcig tu nges par ma nges pa nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang gcig tu nges par ma nges pa nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: then that is not the ascertainment of the one.

original: de'i phyir de'i ngo bo nges pa ni bstan pa'i yon tan nges pa nyid las yin pa'i phyir nges pa med pa ni ma nges pa nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i ngo bo nges pa ni bstan pa'i yon tan nges pa nyid las yin pa'i phyir nges pa med pa ni ma nges pa nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, since the ascertainment of its nature is due to the ascertainment of the stated property, the absence of ascertainment is itself the lack of ascertainment.

original: gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag par dngos po'i chos nyid la brten nas sgrub pa'i skyon brjod par ni ma zad de /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag par dngos po'i chos nyid la brten nas sgrub pa'i skyon brjod par ni ma zad de /
translated: Not only is the fault of the proof based on the nature of things in an inference for the sake of others,

original: 'on kyang smra ba po'i skyon yang yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang smra ba po'i skyon yang yin te /
translated: but also it is a fault of the speaker.

original: ma tshang ba dang rjes su 'gro ba med pa dang rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ma tshang ba dang rjes su 'gro ba med pa dang rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the incomplete, the nonconcomitant, and the erroneously concomitant.

original: des nges par brjod par bya ba'i yon tan gzhan du brjod pa'i phyir na skyon nyid do //
analyzed: des nges par brjod par bya ba'i yon tan gzhan du brjod pa'i phyir na skyon nyid do //
translated: Since the stated property is expressed elsewhere, it is a fault.

original: 'o na phyogs kyi chos la the tshom za ba dang / gang yang rung ba la ma grub pa yang sun 'byin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na phyogs kyi chos la the tshom za ba dang / gang yang rung ba la ma grub pa yang sun 'byin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if the property of the subject is doubted, or if it is not established for either party, then the reason will be a fault.

original: de ni de lta yin te /üîΩ'dod pa ma @203a * //
analyzed: de ni de lta yin te / 'dod pa ma @203a * //
translated: That is so,

original: grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the thesis is not established.

original: phyin ci log tu grub pa yang med pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: phyin ci log tu grub pa yang med pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it the case that there is no establishment of the opposite?

original: phyin ci log tu grub pas ni sun 'byin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu grub pas ni sun 'byin pa ma yin no //
translated: But it is not a refutation if the reason is established in a contrary sense.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it then?

original: sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa bcom pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa bcom pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is a refutation when the power of the proof is destroyed.

original: 'di ltar gzhal bya nyid la sogs pa dag la yang phyin ci log tu grub pa yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhal bya nyid la sogs pa dag la yang phyin ci log tu grub pa yod pa ma yin la /
translated: For, in the case of the probandum, etc., there is no establishment in a contrary sense.

original: mig gis gzung ba nyid la yang phyin ci log tu grub pa ci zhig yod /üîΩgnyi ga la grub par bstan par bya ba gnyi ga la ma grub pa ni phyin ci log yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mig gis gzung ba nyid la yang phyin ci log tu grub pa ci zhig yod / gnyi ga la grub par bstan par bya ba gnyi ga la ma grub pa ni phyin ci log yin no zhe na /
translated: And what is there contrary about the establishment of the reason in the case of the eye, which is perceived?üîΩIf you say that it is contrary when the reason is established for both parties in a debate, but not established for the one to whom the proof is addressed,

original: 'o na ni 'dir yang nges par bstan par bya ba ma nges pa phyin ci log yin no //
analyzed: 'o na ni 'dir yang nges par bstan par bya ba ma nges pa phyin ci log yin no //
translated: then it is not established for the one to whom the proof is addressed when the reason is not ascertained.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba kho na nges pa las sgrub pa dang sun 'byin par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba kho na nges pa las sgrub pa dang sun 'byin par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, only the contradictory reason is a proof or a refutation, because it is ascertained.

original: phyogs kyi chos dgu bstan pa de dag ni gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir rtag go //üîΩbyas pa'i phyir mi rtag go //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos dgu bstan pa de dag ni gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir rtag go // byas pa'i phyir mi rtag go //
translated: The nine reasons that have been taught are permanent because they are objects of knowledge.üîΩThey are impermanent because they are produced.

original: mi rtag pa'i phyir rtsol ba las byung ba'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i phyir rtsol ba las byung ba'o //
translated: They are produced by effort because they are impermanent.

original: byas ba'i phyir rtag go / gson pa'i lus ni bdag dang bcas pa yin te /
analyzed: byas ba'i phyir rtag go / gson pa'i lus ni bdag dang bcas pa yin te /
translated: The living body is endowed with a self,

original: srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir rtag go / mi rtag pa'i phyir rtsol ba las ma byung ba'o //
analyzed: srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir rtag go / mi rtag pa'i phyir rtsol ba las ma byung ba'o //
translated: because it possesses life, etc.üîΩIt is permanent because it is created by effort.

original: mi rtag ste rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi rtag ste rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is impermanent because it is created by effort.

original: rtag ste lus can ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: rtag ste lus can ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: It is permanent because it is not corporeal.

original: dbye ba la ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ltos nas yod pa'am med par ji ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: dbye ba la ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ltos nas yod pa'am med par ji ltar 'gyur te /
translated: How can there be existence or non-existence in the case of a division, in dependence on the counter-correlate?

original: med pa ni gzhi ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: med pa ni gzhi ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because non-existence is not a basis.

original: 'di la med pa la ji ltar 'gog pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni de ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di la med pa la ji ltar 'gog pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni de ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: Here, it has already been explained that non-existence is the counter-correlate of cessation and the counter-correlate of that is the characteristic of that.

original: gal te 'di mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin na gtan tshigs med par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te 'di mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin na gtan tshigs med par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If this is the counter-correlate, it follows that there is no reason,

original: thams cad chos gzhan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: thams cad chos gzhan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because everything is endowed with another property.

original: mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: mi 'gyur te /
translated: No, it does not follow.

original: bram ze ma yin pa zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: bram ze ma yin pa zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: like ‚Äúnon-Brahmin.‚Äù

original: de'i rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir de nyid bram ze yin la /
analyzed: de'i rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir de nyid bram ze yin la /
translated: It is a Brahmin because it possesses the caste of a Brahmin,üîΩbut it is not a Brahmin because it is related to other dharmas.

original: chos gzhan dang 'brel pa'i phyir de nyid bram ze ma yin pa yang yin par ni 'jig rten na rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: chos gzhan dang 'brel pa'i phyir de nyid bram ze ma yin pa yang yin par ni 'jig rten na rtogs pa med do //
translated: But this is not understood in the world.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it then?

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i chos mi rten pa'i dngos po yin no //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i chos mi rten pa'i dngos po yin no //
translated: It is a thing that does not support the dharma that is intended.

original: dgag pa'i yul gzhan yin yang sbyor ba ni rnam par phye nas 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgag pa'i yul gzhan yin yang sbyor ba ni rnam par phye nas 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even though the object of negation is different, the application is made by distinguishing it.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan @203b nyid 'gal ba'i phyir yang de ltar rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan @203b nyid 'gal ba'i phyir yang de ltar rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it understood in this way because of the contradiction of the characteristic of the similar class.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyis mtshungs pa zhes bya ba 'di la /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyis mtshungs pa zhes bya ba 'di la /
translated: In this statement, ‚Äúthe sameness of the universal of the probandum,‚Äù

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyi kho nas zhes bya ba yin na mthun pa'i phyogs 'ga' yang med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyi kho nas zhes bya ba yin na mthun pa'i phyogs 'ga' yang med par 'gyur te /
translated: if it is only the universal of the probandum, then there is no similar class at all,

original: rnam pa de lta bu ni mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu ni mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because such a form is impossible.

original: de'i phyir chos gzhan ma spangs pa bsgrub bya'i chos kyi spyi dang 'brel pa'i bum pa la sogs pa ni mthun pa'i phyogs su byed do //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos gzhan ma spangs pa bsgrub bya'i chos kyi spyi dang 'brel pa'i bum pa la sogs pa ni mthun pa'i phyogs su byed do //
translated: Therefore, the pot, etc., which are related to the universal of the probandum, but do not have the other properties, are taken as the similar instances.

original: des mi mthun pa'i phyogs zhes bya bas ni chos gzhan dang ldan pa thams cad rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des mi mthun pa'i phyogs zhes bya bas ni chos gzhan dang ldan pa thams cad rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: By the words ‚Äúand the dissimilar instances‚Äù it is not meant that all those which have the other properties are understood.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: chos des stong pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan gzung yang skyon med do //
analyzed: chos des stong pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan gzung yang skyon med do //
translated: Because they are empty of that property, it is all right to take the others as the instances.

original: yang rgyu ci'i phyir de ltar phyogs kyi chos rnams dgur phye zhe na /
analyzed: yang rgyu ci'i phyir de ltar phyogs kyi chos rnams dgur phye zhe na /
translated: Now, why are the properties of the position divided into nine?

original: rang bzhin 'bras bu bsgrub don du //
analyzed: rang bzhin 'bras bu bsgrub don du //
translated: For the sake of proving essence and effect,

original: gtan tshigs gnyis gnyis bzlog pa gnyis //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gnyis gnyis bzlog pa gnyis //
translated: two reasons each, and two reversals.

original: rtsod phyir khyad par spyi dag ste //
analyzed: rtsod phyir khyad par spyi dag ste //
translated: For the sake of argument, the general and particular,

original: lhag ma ldog ba'i sgrub byed yin //
analyzed: lhag ma ldog ba'i sgrub byed yin //
translated: and the remainder are the proof of the reversal.üîΩIn order to show that only essence and effect are related to themselves, and that the other seven are not, it is said:üîΩFor the sake of proving essence and effect,

original: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dag kho na bdag nyid 'brel pa'i phyir go bar byed pa dang / bzlog na phyin ci log tu byed pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dag kho na bdag nyid 'brel pa'i phyir go bar byed pa dang / bzlog na phyin ci log tu byed pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: two reasons each, and two reversals.üîΩFor the sake of argument, the general and particular,üîΩand the remainder are the proof of the reversal.

original: mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir dang / brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs gnyis dang / rtag ste byas pa'i phyir dang brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes 'gal ba gnyis bstan to //
analyzed: mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir dang / brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs gnyis dang / rtag ste byas pa'i phyir dang brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes 'gal ba gnyis bstan to //
translated: The two reasons, ‚Äúimpermanent, because produced, and because it arises immediately upon the exertion of effort,‚Äù and the two contradictions, ‚Äúpermanent, because produced, and because it arises immediately upon the exertion of effort,‚Äù are taught.

original: rang bzhin las gzhan ni mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad la yod pa mi srid de /
analyzed: rang bzhin las gzhan ni mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad la yod pa mi srid de /
translated: It is impossible for anything other than the nature of sound to exist in all similar instances.

original: rgyu ni 'bras bu la 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu ni 'bras bu la 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cause is not mistaken with regard to the effect.

original: de'i phyir 'bras bu ni mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gnyis su 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras bu ni mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gnyis su 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the effect is engaged in a twofold way in the similar instances.

original: mi rtag pa yin tsam gyis ni thams cad 'bras bu brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba can gyi shes pa rtsom pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa yin tsam gyis ni thams cad 'bras bu brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba can gyi shes pa rtsom pa ma yin te /
translated: One does not begin the cognition that the effect arises immediately upon the exertion of effort with regard to everything that is merely impermanent.

original: des na de ni mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gnyis su gnas so //
analyzed: des na de ni mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gnyis su gnas so //
translated: Therefore, that is present in a twofold way in the similar instances.

original: brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i shes pa sgra mi rtag pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i shes pa sgra mi rtag pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: The cognition that arises immediately upon the exertion of effort is the effect of the impermanence of sound.

original: zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar rtogs she na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar rtogs she na /
translated: How is this understood?

original: sngar yod pa'i shas pa ni des par brtsal ma thag tu 'byung bar rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sngar yod pa'i shas pa ni des par brtsal ma thag tu 'byung bar rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is not reasonable that the prior cognition would arise immediately after the exertion,

original: sgrib byed dang dbang po dang sgra dag la rtsol ba nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrib byed dang dbang po dang sgra dag la rtsol ba nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no application of exertion to the obscuring object, the sense faculty, and the sound.

original: de la dmigs pa'i sgrib pa ni srid pa ma yin no //üîΩ'ga' zhig yod du chug kyang de'i bdag nyid nyams par ma @204a * //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i sgrib pa ni srid pa ma yin no // 'ga' zhig yod du chug kyang de'i bdag nyid nyams par ma @204a * //
translated: It is not possible that there is an obscuring object that focuses on that sound.

original: byas par nus pa bzlog par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byas par nus pa bzlog par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if there were, it is not possible to stop the potency without destroying its nature.

original: de la khyad par skye ba med par ni cung zad byed pa zhes bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de la khyad par skye ba med par ni cung zad byed pa zhes bya ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that it produces a difference without producing a difference.

original: cung zad mi byed pa yang ji ltar gang gi sgrib par byed pa'am gzhan yin /
analyzed: cung zad mi byed pa yang ji ltar gang gi sgrib par byed pa'am gzhan yin /
translated: How could something that does not produce a difference obscure something else?

original: gang gis sgrib par byed par 'dod pa rtsig pa la sogs pas bum pa la sogs pa dag la khyad par ci zhig bskyed pa'am nyams par byas she na /
analyzed: gang gis sgrib par byed par 'dod pa rtsig pa la sogs pas bum pa la sogs pa dag la khyad par ci zhig bskyed pa'am nyams par byas she na /
translated: What difference is produced or destroyed by the wall, etc. that is asserted to obscure the pot, etc.?

original: de dag khyad par cung zad byed par ni mi smra'i /
analyzed: de dag khyad par cung zad byed par ni mi smra'i /
translated: We do not say that it produces a difference.

original: 'on kyang bum pa'i skad cig thams cad ni thams cad kyi dbang po'i shes pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang bum pa'i skad cig thams cad ni thams cad kyi dbang po'i shes pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
translated: But not all moments of the pot are causes of the visual consciousness of all.

original: phan tshun lhan cig tu gyur pa'i yul dang dbang po dang snang ba dag phan tshun khyad par can gyi skad cig gzhan skyed par byed pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: phan tshun lhan cig tu gyur pa'i yul dang dbang po dang snang ba dag phan tshun khyad par can gyi skad cig gzhan skyed par byed pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yin te /
translated: The object, sense faculty, and light that are mutually simultaneous are causes of consciousness because they generate another moment that is distinguished from each other.

original: phan gdags par bya ba ma yin pa ltos par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan gdags par bya ba ma yin pa ltos par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not suitable that what is not to be benefited is dependent.

original: de lta ma yin te nus pa'i rang bzhin rtag tu skyed pa'am mi skyed par 'gyur ro /
analyzed: de lta ma yin te nus pa'i rang bzhin rtag tu skyed pa'am mi skyed par 'gyur ro /
translated: Otherwise, the nature of that which is able would always generate or not generate.

original: de dag kyang thogs pa byed pa gzhan gyis bar du mchod na phan tshun phan 'dogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag kyang thogs pa byed pa gzhan gyis bar du mchod na phan tshun phan 'dogs pa yin te /
translated: And they are mutually beneficial when another obstruction does not intervene.

original: bar du mchod pa'i yul rung ba de dag gi lhan cig byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bar du mchod pa'i yul rung ba de dag gi lhan cig byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that which is unobstructed is suitable as the cooperating condition of those.

original: bar chad yod na rgyu med pas nus pa'i skad cig gzhan mi skye ba'i phyir yul de'i rnam par shes pa mi skye ba'i phyir rnam /
analyzed: bar chad yod na rgyu med pas nus pa'i skad cig gzhan mi skye ba'i phyir yul de'i rnam par shes pa mi skye ba'i phyir rnam /
translated: If there is an obstruction, then since there is no cause, another moment of potential does not arise, and consciousness of that object does not arise.

original: bar chod zhugs na sngar skyes pa'i nus pa 'gags pa'i phyir dang / rgyu med pas skye bar 'dod pa gzhan yang ma skyes pa'i phyir na rgyu ma tshang bas shes pa mi skye ba'i phyir rtsig pa la sogs pa sgrib par brjod kyi /
analyzed: bar chod zhugs na sngar skyes pa'i nus pa 'gags pa'i phyir dang / rgyu med pas skye bar 'dod pa gzhan yang ma skyes pa'i phyir na rgyu ma tshang bas shes pa mi skye ba'i phyir rtsig pa la sogs pa sgrib par brjod kyi /
translated: If there is an obstruction, the previously arisen potential ceases, and since there is no cause, another consciousness does not arise, because the cause is incomplete. Therefore it is said that walls and so on obstruct consciousness,

original: rung ba'i gegs byed pa'i phyir ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rung ba'i gegs byed pa'i phyir ni ma yin te /
translated: but they do not obstruct consciousness because they prevent its arising.

original: de ni rang gi ngo bo las mi 'pho ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rang gi ngo bo las mi 'pho ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it does not move from its own nature.

original: yang na dngos po skad cig ma rnams ni phan tshun 'dogs par srid pa yang yin te /
analyzed: yang na dngos po skad cig ma rnams ni phan tshun 'dogs par srid pa yang yin te /
translated: Or else, it is possible that momentary things mutually assist each other,

original: rgyu dang rkyen gyi nus pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen gyi nus pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the power of causes and conditions is inconceivable to those who are not omniscient.

original: des na gal te dbang po dang yul gyi bar na gnas pa'i sgrib pas de gnyis la rnam par shes pa bskyed pa dang mi mthun pa'i khyad par ches cher byed pa yang yin te /
analyzed: des na gal te dbang po dang yul gyi bar na gnas pa'i sgrib pas de gnyis la rnam par shes pa bskyed pa dang mi mthun pa'i khyad par ches cher byed pa yang yin te /
translated: Therefore, if the obstruction that exists between the sense faculty and the object causes a very great difference in the production of consciousness,

original: sgrib pa'i bye brag gi sgra la sogs pa gsal ba dang mi gsal bar thos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrib pa'i bye brag gi sgra la sogs pa gsal ba dang mi gsal bar thos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because sound, etc., are heard distinctly or indistinctly due to the difference in obstruction.

original: de lta ma yin na gang la yang cung zad kyang mi byed pa ni yod kyang med pa dang mtshungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na gang la yang cung zad kyang mi byed pa ni yod kyang med pa dang mtshungs pa'i phyir /
translated: If it were not so, then since that which does not perform any function at all is the same as if it did not exist,

original: 'di'i 'di zhes @204b nye bar bsdu ba ni rnam par rtog pas sprul pa nyid du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'di'i 'di zhes @204b nye bar bsdu ba ni rnam par rtog pas sprul pa nyid du 'gyur gyi /
translated: the designation of this as that would be a mere fabrication by conceptualization.

original: dngos po la brten pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po la brten pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It would not be based on an entity.

original: sgro btags pa'i rjes su byed pa can gyi don byed pa yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgro btags pa'i rjes su byed pa can gyi don byed pa yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Nor would there be any performance of a function that conforms to the superimposition.

original: mer nye bar btags pas ni bram ze'i khye'u mtshed pa sgrub par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mer nye bar btags pas ni bram ze'i khye'u mtshed pa sgrub par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The designation of fire does not establish the Brahmin boy as the one who is to be tormented.

original: de'i phyir rtog pa de yod kyang des dngos po 'gyur ba ma yin gyi rang gi ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rtog pa de yod kyang des dngos po 'gyur ba ma yin gyi rang gi ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin gnas pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, even though the conception exists, the thing does not change, but remains just as it is in its own nature.

original: des na sgrib pa yod kyang dbang po la sogs pa shes pa bskyed par 'gyur na de ltar yang ma yin no //
analyzed: des na sgrib pa yod kyang dbang po la sogs pa shes pa bskyed par 'gyur na de ltar yang ma yin no //
translated: Thus, even though there is obscuration, the sense faculties and so on would generate consciousness, but that is not the case.

original: de'i phyir des khyad par byas par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir des khyad par byas par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is understood that they are qualified by that.

original: de ltar sgra rtag pa rnams ni 'ga' zhig yod na khyad par nyams pa'am skye ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar sgra rtag pa rnams ni 'ga' zhig yod na khyad par nyams pa'am skye ba ma yin no //
translated: Thus, if some permanent sounds exist, they do not lose their distinction or arise.

original: des na gal te de dag skyed pa'i rang bzhin yin na thams cad la thams cad kyi tshe rang gi yul can shes pa thams cad skyed pa'am /
analyzed: des na gal te de dag skyed pa'i rang bzhin yin na thams cad la thams cad kyi tshe rang gi yul can shes pa thams cad skyed pa'am /
translated: Therefore, if they have the nature of generating consciousness, they would always generate all consciousnesses that have them as their objects, or

original: de lta ma yin na nam yang gang la yang 'ga' yang ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni gcig tu nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na nam yang gang la yang 'ga' yang ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni gcig tu nges pa yin no //
translated: otherwise, they would never generate any at all. This is a definite rule.

original: 'di snyam du sgrib pas rtag tu sgra thams cad ma thos pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di snyam du sgrib pas rtag tu sgra thams cad ma thos pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: One might think that sound is not always heard due to obscuration,üîΩbut

original: 'on kyang de dag rtogs pa la dbang po la phan 'dogs pa'am gzhan yang rung lhan cig byed pa so sor nges pa cung zad yod pa yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang de dag rtogs pa la dbang po la phan 'dogs pa'am gzhan yang rung lhan cig byed pa so sor nges pa cung zad yod pa yin la /
translated: However, in order to understand them, there is a slight certainty that the assisting factors, such as the faculties, are individually distinct.

original: de res 'ga' 'ga' zhig la 'gyur pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de res 'ga' 'ga' zhig la 'gyur pa'i phyir /
translated: Since they sometimes occur,

original: 'di dag gi res 'ga' 'ga' zhig tu thos pa ni des byas pa yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'di dag gi res 'ga' 'ga' zhig tu thos pa ni des byas pa yin no snyam na /
translated: one might think that the result is produced by them.

original: kho bo cag rgyu rnams kyi lhan cig byed pa spong ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: kho bo cag rgyu rnams kyi lhan cig byed pa spong ba ni ma yin te /
translated: We do not deny that causes have assisting factors,

original: 'on kyang rgyu rnams ni de'i gnas skabs kyi phan 'dogs pa'i don la ltos pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyu rnams ni de'i gnas skabs kyi phan 'dogs pa'i don la ltos pa nyid de /
translated: but causes depend on the object that benefits their state,

original: de las khyad par thob pa dag 'bras bu la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las khyad par thob pa dag 'bras bu la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because those that obtain a special state are connected to the result.

original: de bzhin du gal te sgra yang 'ga' zhig la ltos nas 'bras bu byed na ni byed la rag ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du gal te sgra yang 'ga' zhig la ltos nas 'bras bu byed na ni byed la rag ste /
translated: Similarly, if sound produces a result in dependence on something, it produces it,

original: sngar gyi rang bzhin la nges pa zhes bya ba de ltar ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngar gyi rang bzhin la nges pa zhes bya ba de ltar ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: but it is not definite that it has a previous nature.

original: de ni nyams pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni nyams pa'i phyir te /
translated: That is not so, because it would deteriorate.

original: ltos par bya ba'i rtsol ba'am /
analyzed: ltos par bya ba'i rtsol ba'am /
translated: If it is necessary to rely on effort,

original: rtsol ba'i legs par byas pa'i dbang po'am /
analyzed: rtsol ba'i legs par byas pa'i dbang po'am /
translated: or the sense faculty that is the result of a good action,

original: gzhan las rang bzhin gzhan thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan las rang bzhin gzhan thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: or the other that is obtained by nature.

original: phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa ni ltos par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / de'i phan pa don gzhan nyid yin na de'i zhes 'brel pa med pa la sogs pa yang bshad zin to //
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa ni ltos par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / de'i phan pa don gzhan nyid yin na de'i zhes 'brel pa med pa la sogs pa yang bshad zin to //
translated: It has been explained that that which does not benefit is not to be relied upon, and that if its benefit is something else, then there is no connection with that, etc.

original: de shes bya ma yin par yang 'gyur @205a * //
analyzed: de shes bya ma yin par yang 'gyur @205a * //
translated: It would also be the case that it is not an object of knowledge,

original: te / phan pa nyid las shes pa skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: te / phan pa nyid las shes pa skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because knowledge arises from benefit itself.

original: de'i phyir sgra 'di ni dbang po'am phrad pa'am bdag gam gzhan yang rung ste rang gi shes pa bskyed pa la shes pa bskyed pa'i rkyen 'ga' zhig la ltos pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra 'di ni dbang po'am phrad pa'am bdag gam gzhan yang rung ste rang gi shes pa bskyed pa la shes pa bskyed pa'i rkyen 'ga' zhig la ltos pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, this sound is not dependent on any condition that produces knowledge, whether it is the sense faculty, contact, the self, or something else, in order to produce its own knowledge.

original: thams cad de la cung zad kyang mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad de la cung zad kyang mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because nothing does anything to it at all.

original: 'dis ni dbang po dang sgra la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir rtsol ba dang 'bras bu dang bcas pa yang bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni dbang po dang sgra la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir rtsol ba dang 'bras bu dang bcas pa yang bsal ba yin no //
translated: This also eliminates effort and result, because it is applied to the sense faculty and sound.

original: dbang po la phan btags pas kyang sgra'i lhan cig byed par 'gyur na ltos pa med pa'i phyir de yang bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: dbang po la phan btags pas kyang sgra'i lhan cig byed par 'gyur na ltos pa med pa'i phyir de yang bsal ba yin no //
translated: If the sense faculty were also a cooperative condition of sound by virtue of benefiting it, then that would be eliminated because it is not related to sound.

original: de'i phyir dmigs par bya ba'i rang bzhin de rang gi rang bzhin las ma 'phos pa'i phyir rtag tu dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir dmigs par bya ba'i rang bzhin de rang gi rang bzhin las ma 'phos pa'i phyir rtag tu dmigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, since the nature of the object of apprehension does not depart from its own nature, it would always be apprehended.

original: gal te 'ga' zhig la nus pa 'thob pa'am nyams par mi 'gyur ba de lta na de rtag par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: gal te 'ga' zhig la nus pa 'thob pa'am nyams par mi 'gyur ba de lta na de rtag par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: If it were not the case that something obtains or loses its potential, then it would be permanent.

original: shes pa skyed pa'i nus pa de las don gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa skyed pa'i nus pa de las don gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the potential to generate consciousness is not different from it.

original: don gzhan yin na yang skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gzhan yin na yang skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were different from it, there would be a fault.

original: 'di rtsol ba ma brtsams pa dang chad pa na ni nam yang ma dmigs te /
analyzed: 'di rtsol ba ma brtsams pa dang chad pa na ni nam yang ma dmigs te /
translated: When it does not begin to function or when it is interrupted, it is never apprehended.

original: des na de'i bdag nyid la 'di cung zad byed par rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: des na de'i bdag nyid la 'di cung zad byed par rtogs pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is understood that it is slightly functional in its own nature.

original: byed pa po'i chos mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa po'i chos mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the quality of an agent is seen.

original: de'i phyir brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i shes pa rgyu mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin can gyi 'bras bur 'grub bo //
analyzed: de'i phyir brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i shes pa rgyu mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin can gyi 'bras bur 'grub bo //
translated: Therefore, the cognition that occurs immediately after the effort is established as the effect of a cause that is impermanent by nature.

original: sngar yod pa yi shes pa ni //
analyzed: sngar yod pa yi shes pa ni //
translated: The cognition that exists previously

original: brtsal ma thag 'byung nges min te //
analyzed: brtsal ma thag 'byung nges min te //
translated: is not necessarily produced immediately after the effort.

original: sgrib byed dbang po sgra la de //
analyzed: sgrib byed dbang po sgra la de //
translated: Because the obscuring entity, the sense faculty, and the sound

original: rnam kun nyer sbyor med phyir ro //üîΩltos pa med pa res 'ga'i tshe //
analyzed: rnam kun nyer sbyor med phyir ro // ltos pa med pa res 'ga'i tshe //
translated: are not always connected.üîΩBecause it is contradictory for that which is independent

original: 'bras bu mi byed 'gal ba'i phyir //
analyzed: 'bras bu mi byed 'gal ba'i phyir //
translated: to sometimes not produce the effect.

original: shes pa 'di 'dra res 'ga' ba'i //
analyzed: shes pa 'di 'dra res 'ga' ba'i //
translated: This kind of cognition that sometimes

original: 'bras bur grub pas de rtags yin //
analyzed: 'bras bur grub pas de rtags yin //
translated: is established as the effect, and that is the reason.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
translated: These are the summary verses.

original: dper brjod pa 'di nyid kyis gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul bstan pa yin yang 'bras bu'i dper brjod pa las rang bzhin logs shig tu byas pa ni thams cad de'i bdag nyid du rtogs par mi 'gyur bar byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dper brjod pa 'di nyid kyis gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul bstan pa yin yang 'bras bu'i dper brjod pa las rang bzhin logs shig tu byas pa ni thams cad de'i bdag nyid du rtogs par mi 'gyur bar byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Although this very example illustrates the domain of the definition of the reason, the nature is stated separately from the example of the effect in order to prevent the understanding that everything is of the nature of that.

original: don bshad kyang rjes su dpag par gtan tshigs brjod pa'i dbang du bya ba ni bye brag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don bshad kyang rjes su dpag par gtan tshigs brjod pa'i dbang du bya ba ni bye brag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of the word ‚Äúreason‚Äù is explained, but it is to be inferred from the statement of the reason.

original: des na 'dir dbye ba tsam zhig bshad de /
analyzed: des na 'dir dbye ba tsam zhig bshad de /
translated: Therefore, here we have merely given the classification of the reason.

original: mtshan nyid ni 'di nyid yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ni 'di nyid yin no //
translated: This is the definition of the reason.

original: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi dper @205b brjod pa 'dis ni phyogs gcig la brtan pa'i rang bzhin yang bshad par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi dper @205b brjod pa 'dis ni phyogs gcig la brtan pa'i rang bzhin yang bshad par rig par bya'o //
translated: By this example of the effect reason, the nature of the reason based on one part should be understood.

original: de nyid kyis ni dper brjod pa 'dra bar gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni dper brjod pa 'dra bar gsungs te /
translated: By this very example, the similarity is stated,

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i gsal ba dang skye ba dag la de ltar brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i gsal ba dang skye ba dag la de ltar brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the manifestation and the arising that occur immediately after the effort are so described.

original: yod pa gang med mi 'byung ba'am //
analyzed: yod pa gang med mi 'byung ba'am //
translated: Whatever exists that does not occur without it,

original: rang bdag rnam dbyer med can gang //
analyzed: rang bdag rnam dbyer med can gang //
translated: and whatever is inseparable from its own nature,

original: des ni de dang 'khrul mi 'gyur //
analyzed: des ni de dang 'khrul mi 'gyur //
translated: that cannot be mistaken for anything else.

original: zhes bya'i don du de rab phye //üîΩldan pa can sogs gang dag la //
analyzed: zhes bya'i don du de rab phye // ldan pa can sogs gang dag la //
translated: This is the classification of that.üîΩWhatever does not have such a relation,

original: de 'dra'i 'brel pa yod min pa //
analyzed: de 'dra'i 'brel pa yod min pa //
translated: such as the possessor and so on,

original: de dag 'khrul pa srid pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de dag 'khrul pa srid pa'i phyir //
translated: can be mistaken for something else.

original: gtan tshigs min zhes bshad pa yin //
analyzed: gtan tshigs min zhes bshad pa yin //
translated: It is not a reason.

original: 'brel pa yod pa yin na yang //
analyzed: 'brel pa yod pa yin na yang //
translated: Even if there is a relation,

original: de nyid rtogs pa'i sgrub byed yin //üîΩnges pa med na mi 'byung yin //
analyzed: de nyid rtogs pa'i sgrub byed yin // nges pa med na mi 'byung yin //
translated: it is a proof of the understanding of that.üîΩIf there is no ascertainment, it is not a reason.

original: nges pa med na sgrub byed min //
analyzed: nges pa med na sgrub byed min //
translated: If there is no ascertainment, it is not a proof.

original: zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
translated: These are the verses in the middle.

original: gal te ji skad bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi mi dmigs pa 'ga' zhig kyang gtan tshigs gsum pa ma yin nam de ci'i phyir dper ma brjod ce na /
analyzed: gal te ji skad bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi mi dmigs pa 'ga' zhig kyang gtan tshigs gsum pa ma yin nam de ci'i phyir dper ma brjod ce na /
translated: If non-apprehension, which has the characteristics as explained, is not the third reason, why is it not mentioned as an example?

original: de yang rang bzhin gyis gtan tshigs kyi khongs su 'dus pa'i phyir dper brjod pa kho na ste /
analyzed: de yang rang bzhin gyis gtan tshigs kyi khongs su 'dus pa'i phyir dper brjod pa kho na ste /
translated: It is included in the class of reasons by nature, and therefore it is mentioned as an example.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / dmigs rung med pa dag la ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / dmigs rung med pa dag la ni //
translated: For those who are not suitable to be apprehended,

original: mi dmigs pa las gzhan med nyid //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa las gzhan med nyid //
translated: there is no existence other than non-apprehension.

original: des na de yod pa las de'i //
analyzed: des na de yod pa las de'i //
translated: Therefore, from the existence of that,

original: rgyu mtshan can gyi sgra shes bsgrub //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan can gyi sgra shes bsgrub //
translated: the sound that is the reason for that is established.

original: bltar rung ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni mi dmigs pa las gzhan ma yin la /
analyzed: bltar rung ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni mi dmigs pa las gzhan ma yin la /
translated: The absence of the nature of the visible is not other than non-apprehension.

original: de grub pas ni de'i rgyu mtshan can med pa'i shes pa dang sgra bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de grub pas ni de'i rgyu mtshan can med pa'i shes pa dang sgra bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni bshad zin to //
translated: And by establishing that, the existence of the cognition and the sound, which are the reasons, is established. This has been explained.

original: rgyu mtshan yod kyang rgyu mtshan can yod par ngas pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan yod kyang rgyu mtshan can yod par ngas pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Even though there is a reason, there is no certainty that the one possessing the reason exists.

original: de ltar rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How, then, is this understood?üîΩ‚ÄúOne cannot see what is visible;

original: bltar rung ma mthong la med ces //
analyzed: bltar rung ma mthong la med ces //
translated: one says that it does not exist.

original: bya ba'i tha snyad 'di grub pas //
analyzed: bya ba'i tha snyad 'di grub pas //
translated: This is the conventional usage.

original: de 'bras yin yang de las ni //
analyzed: de 'bras yin yang de las ni //
translated: Even though it is the result,

original: blo sgra the tshom med par 'gyur //
analyzed: blo sgra the tshom med par 'gyur //
translated: there is no doubt in the mind or in the word.üîΩ‚Äù

original: gang gis nges pa med par 'grub ba tha snyad la gdod gzhug par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis nges pa med par 'grub ba tha snyad la gdod gzhug par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: One cannot first introduce the conventional usage that establishes the absence of a certainty.

original: 'on kyang bltar rung ba'i dngos po ma mthong ba la med do zhes bya bar grub zin pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang bltar rung ba'i dngos po ma mthong ba la med do zhes bya bar grub zin pa nyid do //
translated: But in the case of a visible thing that is not seen, it is already established that it does not exist.

original: nye bar brjod pa med par grub pa dag la tha snyad de rtogs kyang rnam pa ji zhig ltar yul yod na yang yul can mi brtan par byed do //
analyzed: nye bar brjod pa med par grub pa dag la tha snyad de rtogs kyang rnam pa ji zhig ltar yul yod na yang yul can mi brtan par byed do //
translated: Even though one understands the conventional usage in the case of an established absence of description, in some way it undermines the stability of the subject, even when the object exists.

original: med pa'i tha snyad la gang du yang rgyu mtshan @206a * //
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad la gang du yang rgyu mtshan @206a * //
translated: In the case of the term ‚Äúnonexistent,‚Äù there is no reason to apply it to anything.üîΩ

original: gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And there is no other reason for the term ‚Äúnonexistent‚Äù anywhere.

original: de yang 'dis sngar lan cig ma yin par spyad zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang 'dis sngar lan cig ma yin par spyad zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is because this [nonexistent] has already been used many times before.

original: 'di dag gi 'brel pa bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag gi 'brel pa bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: And this [nonexistent] is not to be established by a relation.

original: de'i phyir bltar rung ba ma mthong bar grub na de'i rgyu mtshan can med pa'i shes pa dang sgra dag gi rung ba de nyid la yang the tshom med pa nyid de /
analyzed: de'i phyir bltar rung ba ma mthong bar grub na de'i rgyu mtshan can med pa'i shes pa dang sgra dag gi rung ba de nyid la yang the tshom med pa nyid de /
translated: Therefore, if the visibility of the object is not seen, then there is no doubt about the visibility of the cognition and the word that have that [visibility] as their reason, just as that [visibility].

original: lkog shal la sogs pa grub na ba lang gi tha snyad bzhin no //
analyzed: lkog shal la sogs pa grub na ba lang gi tha snyad bzhin no //
translated: And just as the convention ‚Äúcow‚Äù is made when the dewlap and so on are established.

original: yul yod na yang rmongs pas 'dir //
analyzed: yul yod na yang rmongs pas 'dir //
translated: But when the object exists, the ignorant

original: gzhan dag rjes su mi brjod pa //üîΩgrub pa dang ni chos mthun pas //
analyzed: gzhan dag rjes su mi brjod pa // grub pa dang ni chos mthun pas //
translated: do not mention anything else here.üîΩOnly the indication of the convention

original: brda bstan byed pa 'ba' zhig go //üîΩji ltar mthong dang ma mthong las ;
analyzed: brda bstan byed pa 'ba' zhig go // ji ltar mthong dang ma mthong las ;
translated: through establishment and similarity of attributes.üîΩJust as causality and effect are established

original: / rgyu dang 'bras nyid sgrub pa bzhin //üîΩde gnyis la ni 'bras sogs sgra //
analyzed: / rgyu dang 'bras nyid sgrub pa bzhin // de gnyis la ni 'bras sogs sgra //
translated: from what is seen and not seen,üîΩthe word ‚Äúeffect‚Äù and so on

original: tha snyad don du bkod pa yin //
analyzed: tha snyad don du bkod pa yin //
translated: are posited for the sake of convention in those two.

original: rgyu las 'bras bu rab bsgrub pa //
analyzed: rgyu las 'bras bu rab bsgrub pa //
translated: The effect is well established from the cause.

original: 'di ni rang bzhin nang 'dus phyir //
analyzed: 'di ni rang bzhin nang 'dus phyir //
translated: This is because the nature is included within.

original: gtan tshigs rab dbye bshad pa las //
analyzed: gtan tshigs rab dbye bshad pa las //
translated: In the explanation of the divisions of the reason,

original: tha dad par ni dper ma brjod //
analyzed: tha dad par ni dper ma brjod //
translated: the example is not stated as different.

original: ces bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go / mi dmigs pa las ni khyad par byed pa'i rang bzhin med pa'i tha snyad du rung ba nyid bsgrub bo //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go / mi dmigs pa las ni khyad par byed pa'i rang bzhin med pa'i tha snyad du rung ba nyid bsgrub bo //
translated: This is the intermediate verse. From non-apprehension, the suitability of the convention of the absence of the nature of distinction is established.

original: khyab pa yang gzhan du tha snyad de tsam las grub pa ste khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab pa yang gzhan du tha snyad de tsam las grub pa ste khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The pervasion is established elsewhere by just that convention, because there is no distinction.

original: mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i med pa grub pas med pa'i tha snyad du bsgrub pa yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i med pa grub pas med pa'i tha snyad du bsgrub pa yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: It has been explained that the establishment of the convention of non-existence is by establishing the non-existence that has the nature of non-apprehension.

original: mi dmigs pa de nyid ji lta bu grub cing med de 'ga' zhig gi rgyud yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa de nyid ji lta bu grub cing med de 'ga' zhig gi rgyud yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is that very non-apprehension established? How is it non-existent? How is it in the continuum of some?

original: nyes pa de ni med de 'di ltar /
analyzed: nyes pa de ni med de 'di ltar /
